Uses of Class
com.sun.tools.visualvm.host.Host

Packages that use Host
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application Support for applications in VisualVM. 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.host Support for hosts in VisualVM. 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.host.model Model for various statistics related to Host (memory, OS, etc.) 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.host.views Support for views (subtabs) for hosts. 
 

Uses of Host in com.sun.tools.visualvm.application
 

Methods in com.sun.tools.visualvm.application that return Host
 Host Application.getHost()
          Returns Host on which the application is running.
 

Constructors in com.sun.tools.visualvm.application with parameters of type Host

          Creates new instance of Application defined by a Host and unique identificator.
 

Uses of Host in com.sun.tools.visualvm.host
 

Fields in com.sun.tools.visualvm.host declared as Host
static Host Host.LOCALHOST
          Instance representing the localhost.
static Host Host.UNKNOWN_HOST
          Instance representing an unknown host (placeholder node in Applications window, hidden if not used).
 

Methods in com.sun.tools.visualvm.host that return Host
 Host HostsSupport.createHost(java.lang.String hostname)
          Creates new host from provided hostname.
 Host HostsSupport.createHost(java.lang.String hostname, java.lang.String displayname)
          Creates new host from provided hostname and display name.
 Host HostsSupport.getHostByAddress(java.net.InetAddress inetAddress)
          Returns already known Host instance with the same InetAddress or null.
 Host HostsSupport.getOrCreateHost(java.lang.String hostname, boolean interactive)
          Returns an existing Host instance or creates a new Host if needed.
